title: Did Trump say, "Treason is a black betrayal; no black president again anytime soon"?
subtitle: Mimi created the impression that Donald Trump claimed that there would never be a black president again anytime soon because "The Lasa is a feature of blacks."
author: David Emery
vclaim: Donald Trump said, "Laser is a feature of blacks... I think so. No black person will be president again anytime soon."
